includedAssets.title: The Da Vinci Code
includedAssets.synopsis: Tom Hanks and Audrey Tautou race across Europe, pursued by sinister monk Paul Bettany, to uncover a secret protected for centuries. Mystery thriller.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Tom Hanks and Audrey Tautou race across Europe, pursued by sinister monk Paul Bettany, to uncover a secret protected for centuries. Mystery thriller.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Tom Hanks and Audrey Tautou race across Europe, pursued by sinister monk Paul Bettany, to uncover a secret protected for centuries. Mystery thriller.

includedAssets.title: Angels & Demons
includedAssets.synopsis: Dan Brown disciples get another holy dose of ecclesiastical intrigue in this fast-moving follow-up to The Da Vinci Code. This time out crack symbologist Robert Langdon (Tom Hanks) is called in by the Vatican when The Iluminati - an ancient anti-Catholic organisation -  hatch a revenge plot to destroy the church. He's joined by Italian scientist Vittoria Vetra (Ayelet Zurer) in an investigation that takes them through crypts, catacombs and cathedrals in a bid to stop The Illuminati's diabolical plans for destruction.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harvard symbologist Tom Hanks is called in to save Vatican City from being incinerated by an ancient sect.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Dan Brown disciples get another holy dose of ecclesiastical intrigue in this fast-moving follow-up to The Da Vinci Code. This time out crack symbologist Robert Langdon (Tom Hanks) is called in by the Vatican when The Iluminati - an ancient anti-Catholic organisation -  hatch a revenge plot to destroy the church. He's joined by Italian scientist Vittoria Vetra (Ayelet Zurer) in an investigation that takes them through crypts, catacombs and cathedrals in a bid to stop The Illuminati's diabolical plans for destruction.

includedAssets.title: Inferno (2016)
includedAssets.synopsis: The end of the world is nigh in Dan Brown's frenetic follow-up to The Da Vinci Code and Angels & Demons. A Dante-obsessed madman (Ben Foster) has developed a devastating virus that could cut the world's population in two, so it's a good job crack symbologist Robert Langdon (Tom Hanks) is on hand to thwart his plans. Doing so requires teaming up with a brilliant, young doctor (Felicity Jones), shaking off a pesky case of amnesia, and tearing around the likes of Florence, Venice and Istanbul. Ron Howard is back in the director's chair, while Omar Sy and Irrfan Khan round out the cast.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When a Dante-obsessed madman develops a devastating virus it's up to crack symbology professor Tom Hanks to save the day.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The end of the world is nigh in Dan Brown's frenetic follow-up to The Da Vinci Code and Angels & Demons. A Dante-obsessed madman (Ben Foster) has developed a devastating virus that could cut the world's population in two, so it's a good job crack symbologist Robert Langdon (Tom Hanks) is on hand to thwart his plans. Doing so requires teaming up with a brilliant, young doctor (Felicity Jones), shaking off a pesky case of amnesia, and tearing around the likes of Florence, Venice and Istanbul. Ron Howard is back in the director's chair, while Omar Sy and Irrfan Khan round out the cast.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, violence

includedAssets.title: Dan Brown Trilogy Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Tom Hanks is a symbology professor fighting to unearth ancient secrets, defeat sinister sects and save the world in this twisting trilogy based on Dan Brown's series of novels.
